main event: On the night of August 12, 1962, a family in Danbury, Connecticut reported seeing a round object emitting a blue-green light traveling from south to north.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 200 to 300 miles above the earth's surface.,The sighting occurred around 9:30 PM and the light disappeared at approximately 9:37 PM E.D.T.,The sighting left no trail behind it.,The report was submitted to NASA for further investigation.,James E. Lowry Jr. responded stating that such sightings are common and difficult to assess.
sighted object: a round object emitting a blue-green light
